headings.heading: Haircutting
headings.description: We do not have pricing for trims. All haircuts are full services that include a wash and style; either a wash and go or a silk press. Specify with stylist upon arrival.

headings.heading: Styling
headings.description: Our Silk Press service does not include a trim

Featured.title: Haircut
Featured.description: We do not have pricing for trims. All haircuts are full services that include a wash and style; either a wash and go or a silk press. Specify with stylist upon arrival.

Featured.title: Deep Condition (Standard)
Featured.description: This is an add on deep conditioning treatment service for clients who need to restore moisture back into their hair. MUST book styling or haircut service to follow. Appointments made without a styling service will be cancelled.

Featured.title: Blow Dry/Silk Press
Featured.description: Please do NOT apply castor oil or coconut oil to hair before service.If you have NOT had a professional trim/haircut in the last 3 months, you must book a haircut service.

Featured.title: Root Touch-Up (Single Process)
Featured.description: For RETURNING client, and anyone needing a root touch up. With less that 2 inches of root.MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Featured.title: Haircut Short Tapered
Featured.description: A taper is a cut that leaves your hair long at the top and short on the sides. Hair gradually gets shorter as you move down the back and sides of your head. THIS IS NOT A BARBER HAIRCUT. We do not do low fades or tight fades. This is a soft short haircut.The finished style is a wash-and-go.This is NOT for wearing your hair straight.

Haircutting.title: A Bob Haircut
Haircutting.description: A bob cut, is a short to medium length haircut, in which the hair is typically cut straight around the head at approximately jaw level, and no longer than shoulder-length.A bob cut is typically done on straight hair, but can be worn curly.

Haircutting.title: Haircut
Haircutting.description: We do not have pricing for trims. All haircuts are full services that include a wash and style; either a wash and go or a silk press. Specify with stylist upon arrival.

Haircutting.title: Haircut Short Tapered
Haircutting.description: A taper is a cut that leaves your hair long at the top and short on the sides. Hair gradually gets shorter as you move down the back and sides of your head. THIS IS NOT A BARBER HAIRCUT. We do not do low fades or tight fades. This is a soft short haircut.The finished style is a wash-and-go.This is NOT for wearing your hair straight.

Styling.title: Blow Dry/Silk Press
Styling.description: Please do NOT apply castor oil or coconut oil to hair before service.If you have NOT had a professional trim/haircut in the last 3 months, you must book a haircut service.If you would like a trim/haircut, please book our hair cut service with a stylist.

Color Services.title: NEW SINGLE PROCESS WITH FULL HEAD HIGHLIGHTS
Color Services.description: This process completely changes your hair color to a brown, with a full head of blonde highlights added to create dimension. MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: NEW FULL HEAD HIGHLIGHTS
Color Services.description: A full head of highlights to make hair blonde, golden, or soft browns. Natural hair base color stays the same. MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: BLONDE HIGHLIGHTS (Half Head Highlights)
Color Services.description: A half head of highlights to make hair blonde, golden, or softs browns. Natural hair base color stays the same. MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: LIGHT BROWN/ SOFT GOLDEN BROWN/ LIGHT ASH BROWN (Virgin Single Process w/ Few Highlights)
Color Services.description: MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: Dark BROWNS AND BLACK (Virgin Single Process)
Color Services.description: This is for clients who would like an overall color change in the dark brown family or black and who have never received color before.MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: COPPER/ RED HEADS/ BURGUNDY (Virgin Single Process)
Color Services.description: MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: Creative Color PINK/ BLUE/ GREEN/ PURPLE
Color Services.description: Hair Color that is not found in Nature. BLUE PINK GREEN PURPLE. MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: Root Touch-Up (Single Process)
Color Services.description: For RETURNING client, and anyone needing a root touch up. With less that 2 inches of root. MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Color Services.title: Demi/Glaze Color
Color Services.description: This service is to add shine or color depth to hair.  It is temporary hair color, primarily used to color hair dark and to cover grays. MUST BOOK STYLING SERVICE. (Please book a silk press, haircut, or wash and go for post color service)

Extension, Installs and Wigs.title: Install Removal
Extension, Installs and Wigs.description: Service includes safe removal of extension hair, take down of braided foundation from weave install performed at H2 Salon. . A detox shampoo, deep conditioning treatment. Afterwards hair will be blow dried. Additional styling service must be booked if seeking any styling.

Extension, Installs and Wigs.title: Intricate Weave Install
Extension, Installs and Wigs.description: An install elaborately curated with you in mind. Service includes the following:-deep cleansing of the scalp-conditioning treatment for your hair's specific needs.—maintenance trim on your hair if needed.-secure braided foundation with a net base-up to 3 bundles installed   -cleansing and preparation of your extensions -desired cut style and finish -information on how to care for and treat your hair at home-first follow up appointment weave blow dry service included **must be booked same day of receiving service and scheduled 1-2 weeks post install**

Extension, Installs and Wigs.title: Braid Down for Wig
Extension, Installs and Wigs.description: Does not include instillation. Includes wash condition and braid down.

Extension, Installs and Wigs.title: Weave Take Out (Prior to Weave Install Only)

Treatments.title: Detox Shampoo
Treatments.description: This is an add on treatment for clients who have taken out braids or a protective style and have scalp build-up. MUST book styling or haircut service to follow. Appointments made without a styling service will be cancelled.

Treatments.title: Deep Condition (Standard)
Treatments.description: This is an add on deep conditioning treatment service for clients who need to restore moisture back into their hair. MUST book styling or haircut service to follow. Appointments made without a styling service will be cancelled.
